text:
Simon Cohen (born 17 November 1999) is an English mixing engineer, songwriter and recording producer.
His song "SEEYA" is the most watched song on YouTube..
Overview.
Cohen is a producer of electronic dance music, pop music, and rap.
Versions on recordings posters, including volume records, protocol recordings, and Armada, have worked with artists including Steve Angelo, Ansel Elgort, and 10k.caash.
Decorations.
On 9 October 2015, Cohen became the youngest artist to issue the Steve Angelo record label after winning the remix contest for the Anglo movie "Children of the Wild". His remix was later included in the 2015 Ultra Music Festival Worldmost Aftermovie. To reach number 10 on the Beatport Big Room chart. Cohen's music was played by many big names in electronic music, including Hardwell, Blasterjaxx, Nicky Romero, Dannic, Dada Life, Gareth Emery, and Thomas Gold.
Education.
Cohen studied at the School of Professional Children, exactly at the Cliff Davis Institute of Music at New York University.
Localisation.
New Yourk, NY
